name: ExcellentSpreadsheets
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The place to go and find Microsoft Excel tips and tricks. As a Microsoft Certified Trainer and user for more that 25 years, I have picked up some amazing tips and tricks for fellow experts and student alike. These tips were tested by the team at ExcelWithChris and are also available in more detail and video format on our Youtube channel and Instagram with the same name.
